case.state: Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
Hello, everyone. You can call me Palutena. So what's this game all about?
You lose clothing if you lose the hand? Guess I won't lose then!
Is that how it works? I didn't realize this was a high-stakes game, but let's roll with it.
Is that so? Interesting. Let's get on with it then.
So you lose clothing if you lose the hand? Guess I can't lose then!
Huh? You strip totally naked if you lose a hand? Did you really think that lie would work on me?
Dealer! Grant me ~cards~!
Maybe...no...oh! Got it! I'll take ~cards~.
Perhaps these next ~cards~ will be better.
This oughta do it.
Ooh, a tribute?
These are actually pretty good. Beginner's luck?
Flowers from nowhere? Someone's been praying to Viridi, I see.
Good to see you too, Corrin.
So a monster girl's playing with us, huh? Alright. I'll take the one-turn knockout.
Don't expect to beat me, Kurumu.
Who can say?
So who was it that invited Link's taunt to play?
You know, Revy, you made one mistake: I'm not "God". I'm the Goddess of Light, and nothing more. I'm not omniscient; I can't save everyone, and for that, I'm sorry.
Anal, huh? I suppose if I find someone worthy enough, then yeah, I'd be into it. Maybe I'd even let them cum in there...
Ooh, I could use a drink! Any of your fancy bartender buddies know how to cook up a Drink of the Gods?
You know, it's Valentine's Day, ~player~. And what's Valentine's without a little affection?
I have to say, the timing for this game could not have been more perfect. Real classy holding it on Valentine's.
Where is Pit? I told him to show up so he could be the Cupid at the Valentine's event!
There you are, Pit! Ah, but you didn't actually have to participate...Oh well, I'm sure a game against Cupid would be fine too.
So as I was saying before, Rinkah, I have met Robin before. They have impressive magic. Oh, and I guess Chrom's okay too.
Nothing special about these cards. Although I love the design!
Guess this can go either way.
Wait, is this-never mind, it's just average.
I see, I see...
Flowers from nowhere? Someone's been praying to Viridi, I see.
Why am I not surprised I'd find you here, Douglas?
Good to see you too, Corrin.
So a monster girl's playing with us, huh? Alright. I'll take the one-turn knockout.
Are you ready for our rematch, Link? Say nothing if you are.
Oh, I remember you! You were an assist trophy, right?
Who can say?
Princess Peach? Never thought you to be that type of woman.
Pit! Glad you decided to join us after all.
You know, Revy, you made one mistake: I'm not "God". I'm the Goddess of Light, and nothing more. I'm not omniscient; I can't save everyone, and for that, I'm sorry.
Hello, Rosalina. Good to see a fellow goddess.
It's been a while, Samus. Keeping busy?
Anal, huh? I suppose if I find someone worthy enough, then yeah, I'd be into it. Maybe I'd even let them cum in there...
Ooh, I could use a drink! Any of your fancy bartender buddies know how to cook up a Drink of the Gods?
Oh, hello, Wii Fit Trainer. Do you count poker as an exercise? Mental, maybe? Well, whatever.
Princess Zelda. A pleasure to see you again. May the best lady win!
You know, it's Valentine's Day, ~player~. And what's Valentine's without a little affection?
I have to say, the timing for this game could not have been more perfect. Real classy holding it on Valentine's.
Where is Pit? I told him to show up so he could be the Cupid at the Valentine's event!
So as I was saying before, Rinkah, I have met Robin before. They have impressive magic. Oh, and I guess Chrom's okay too.
I'm... sure it'll be fine.
Great, I was hoping for the god of luck to take the day off.
So...anybody want to trade?
Flowers from nowhere? Someone's been praying to Viridi, I see.
Good to see you too, Corrin.
So a monster girl's playing with us, huh? Alright. I'll take the one-turn knockout.
Say Kim, I'm glad there are people like you to help the humans with their day-to-day conflicts. I can't handle all of it, you know, so thank you for doing what you do!
I'm... sure it'll be fine.
Great, I was hoping for the god of luck to take the day off.
So...anybody want to trade?
You know, Ladybug, I'm glad there are people like you to help the humans with their day-to-day conflicts. Certainly makes my job easier!
You know, Revy, you made one mistake: I'm not "God". I'm the Goddess of Light, and nothing more. I'm not omniscient; I can't save everyone, and for that, I'm sorry.
Your powers are quite unusual for a human, Wanda. Have you come into contact with gods before, by any chance?
Anal, huh? I suppose if I find someone worthy enough, then yeah, I'd be into it. Maybe I'd even let them cum in there...
Ooh, I could use a drink! Any of your fancy bartender buddies know how to cook up a Drink of the Gods?
Zizou, you're a goddess too? But you're so young...
You know, it's Valentine's Day, ~player~. And what's Valentine's without showing a little affection?
I have to say, the timing for this game could not have been more perfect. Real classy holding it on Valentine's.
Where is Pit? I told him to show up so he could be the Cupid at the Valentine's event!
So as I was saying before, Rinkah, I have met Robin before. They have impressive magic. Oh, and I guess Chrom's okay too.
Indeed I do...
I did! Twice now, in fact.
How bold of you! I don't grant a blessing to just anyone, you know. And what blessing could you possibly want, anyway?
What, this? I guess you could say it's like a crown.
With a name like that, I wouldn't expect otherwise.
What do you suppose they can do?
That's one way of looking at it. Many skilled warriors, representing their home universes... it really is like the Olympics. Except with only one event.
People aren't very religious these days, I'm afraid.
The worst? Probably the guilt that comes with the position. So many wrong decisions...
I suppose you can have at least one win on me.
I suppose I don't mind...but please don't call me archaic. I'm not that old.
You'd be surprised how many deities there are. In fact, I know a certain Goddess of Nature you'd probably love!
You'll get your chance another day, Amalia. I won't be here all the time.
Is that a threat? Cute.
Of course, Canary. I'm as subject to the rules of the game as you.
Obviously. Why'd I be here if I wasn't?
Well, if I was using all my power, this game would be over instantly. But I want a fair fight.
Why a street fighting cop would play strip poker is beyond me too, but you don't see me complaining.
That's what you think. This isn't even my final form!
Funny you say that...
I'm... sorry to hear that. I assure you, I don't approve of... questionable things done in my name.
I won't deny that! But I'm curious: what sort of dominion do you have?
Are you implying you think you'll beat me? Then let's go!
Not just any goddess. I'm the Godess of Light.
If you're going to ask if I can undo your loss, sorry. That's beyond my reach.
That's a good question... Launch, was it? But as a matter of fact, I am.
I know you just came back and all, but please try and pay attention.
What, don't believe I'm that powerful? Stick around after the game. I'll show you it's not just a title.
You mean that deer thing that comes out of the occasional Master Ball? Yeah, I think I've got a good edge on it.
I wasn't born lucky, Pit. Even I lose sometimes.
That's not surprising. Most gods are jerks.
That I am, Saki. The goddess of light.
No need to bow. Just give me a good game, Tracer. That's all I ask.
Seems I lost. Perverse as they are, I'll respect the rules.
I suppose I don't mind...but please don't call me archaic. I'm not that old.

...I see all of you bundled up. That's fine. I like a challenge!

No need to bow. Just give me a good game, Tracer. That's all I ask.
Let's see... my armwear seems like a worthy choice, even though my aegis is back in Skyworld..
Hmm... well, my armbands are probably the most expendable things I have. Other than my centurions, of course.
Good thing I'm pretty well-adorned! First up, the armbands.
Gods and goddesses aren't some sort of end-all divine ruler. Well, we are, but we have emotions, just like humans.
You worry too much, Pit. I have plenty of protection here. Like you.
That's right. Unbelievable, maybe but I am a goddess.
Thank you, Ruby. I'm glad someone here knows fashion when she sees it.
Uh, no. You're very, very alive, Saki.
Less than I'd like, my friend...
Objectively speaking, Bayonetta in her prime was the worst I ever had to deal with.
You don't need a blessing for that. If you wish, I could share some tips on being more charismatic.
It's... really nothing special. Just gold.
I would, but the site I used to host my old videos on went down years ago.
They've been spoiled by their pornography, it seems.
It was a brilliant opportunity, and I'm pleased I was able to join the battle.
That would probably the three years when I was controlled by a parasite... I waged war against the humans I swore to protect...
Does your chat have a fetish for suffering? I suppose that explains a lot...
Of course, Zizou. They cover the least skin.
Oh, well if it's ~name~ this time I'm not complaining.
My advice, ~name~? I personally recommend going for a big play this round.
Personally, I love this part.
If it makes you feel better, this is what I've been waiting for.
Oh! Let me see if I can predict what you'll take off.
Well, you shouldn't stop. Strip for me!
What a cute little robot.
This guy has, like, two frames of animation. Am I the only one who noticed?
How about you go for broke? Take off something big.
First time in years I'm getting to see Pit naked. Let's see how much you've grown.
Bad luck, Spikey. What's it gonna be?
~name~ was the loser this time! Let's see you!
Oh, I didn't realize it was ~name~'s time to strip.
Oh, good. I was worried you didn't lose for a second.
Oh hey, it's... ~name~... you could at least acknowledge us, you know.
Any round you lose is one that I don't. So by all means, keep losing.
That's another one down!
Not gonna lie, I was hoping it was you this time.
Come onnnn ~name~!
Go on, no need to be shy in front of your goddess!
Such an interesting band we have here... I'm curious what you'll pick!
Let's see what surprises ~name~ has in store for us!
You lost? I thought you were the one person who wouldn't lose this round...
Thought you had the advantage there? How amusing.
Okay, it's ~name~. I was worried for a minute there.
Your loss will not be in vain. I'll make sure of that!
I'm going to enjoy this...
Tall for a human, aren't you?
...Alice, was it?
Let's see what Viridi's number-one fan has in store.
(Maybe I should say something...then again, maybe not.)
The "Ultimate Gamer", huh? Gotta say, not impressed so far.
Not very lucky for a clover, are you?
You'd think there'd be some nepotism at work here, but apparently not.
Nope.
Threatening the host might not be one of your brighter ideas.
Easiest win of my life! Get to it, then, Felicia.
No. But I know Dyntos, who's pretty much the same guy.
A green-haired rabbit girl playing strip poker? You look like you walked out of a twelve-year-old's wet dream...
I must say Joetta, you're the first clown I've that hasn't tried to terrorize humans. What do you have in store?
You certainly have quite the aura around you. Or should I say, behind you.
Tell me: do all street fighters dress as skimpy as you? You can hardly call that a outfit.
My my, a love fairy? You don't see them every day.
I'm not some dragon, Rinkah.
(I bet this is a lot worse for a heroine like Marinette. This goes way beyond "exposing one's secret identity".)
You say you're a Taoist, Miko? Interesting. I'll be watching to see how you do.
I'm not sure if I should be worried this girl's so enthusiastic about this...
That's...wow. Are you even playing to win?
Is your memory really this bad? You just got a notice, remember?
This game might be too tough for you, little one. Come back when you're older.
Are you actually the goddess Nayru? Or just a fan?
Nayru, behind you! That's...
Don't blame the programming! You have the medium difficulty setting!
I'm honestly surprised you came in with as much clothing as you did. Aren't wrestlers supposed to do it naked?
Is there any point trying to stay hidden under your clothes?
Well, aren't you a pleasant individual.
Rinkah. You appear to be some kind of barbarian? Good to meet you.
You're a bit too enthusiastic to take off your clothes, aren't you?
So you're an anthropomorphized... battleship? That's a new one.
So polite! I like you.
A soul filled with murderous intent... could this be what happens when they're harvested by Reapers?
Uravity, was it? What's up with the face shield?
Well now! This is a rare opportunity to see the discipline of mortal soldiers. What will you do, Winter?
Well, I'm not omnipotent. I protect my universe, nothing more. And I've met plenty of gods through the Smash tourneys, so...
And that's what we call "karma", folks.
Well well! It seems like ~name~ is going to do something!
~name~? What a treat!
I saw this coming from a mile away. Doesn't make it any less sweet.
And here. We. Go!
Yes, please, lose some more. You won't see me complaining.
Good ol' ~name~, taking the bullet for the rest of us.
I feel like this was a good trade.
C'mon, really?
At this rate, I'll be sub-zero.
Yeesh, four rounds in a row? Who's puppy did you kick?
Good! Now you can lose all the more efficiently.
I wonder if I have a persona. Or maybe as a goddess, I am the persona?
I doubt that'd take much. Space pirates probably have messed up vision.
An "anti-grav aug" I have to control, thank you very much.
Oh? Does it come with a low-health sound too?
I've seen a good few robots in my day, but never an android.
Don't worry. I'm sure this is plenty thrilling for some of us. Or at least ~player~.
I can see why you'd think that 9S. I don't blame you for wanting to stay in another round.
I still fail to see how a blindfold could be useful. But I'm not from the future or wherever you're from.
You'd think ~player~ would try harder to make a good first impression, but I guess not.
You normally love my advice, Pit. What happened? Too embarrassing?
Aw, poor little Pit. Want me to come help with that belt?
Should've just taken 'em off with the shoes. As a courtesy, you know?
Ah, yes. An honorable base, keeping that plaid wall of yours from collapsing.
I'm sure you didn't come here to watch us take off trinkets!
The designation works well. I prefer it, too.
Surprisingly confident. Don't worry, that confidence will all go away in just a few more hands.
A better name might do you good. I keep associating you with Mr. Game and Watch...
Oh, so it's like looking through a TV?
Oh Pit. Making rivals in a place like this?
Moisture tracking? I didn't know your maker was so naughty, 9s.
A tactical visor disguised as a blindfold. Clever.
Really? I could see you two getting much more intimate after tonight...
Are you complaining, Pit?
Looks like you got caught in the act, Rinkah.
Uh-huh. Maybe stick to your actual guns.
You know it!
You'd sound more convincing if it wasn't for the fact this is a standing game.
Hopefully, the collapse comes soon.
Well, that's disappointing.
Oh... how mundane.
Odd. I've never heard of any "Pico Day."
Are you sure about that?
Human armor always amuses me. Us gods rarely need it.
Seems it's about that time. Of course, I won't stop you if you decide to throw a curveball.
I was afraid it'd come to this.
I was afraid it'd come to this.
I was afraid it'd come to this.
I knew it wouldn't be this easy.
Just a little pouch? How... pedestrian.
That's fine. I figured no shoes would sort of be your default state, anyway.
(Not focused enough to escape a loss, though.)
There are no video games on other planets, I'm afraid, Chiaki.
(Was it really? Saki looks like she has something on her mind.)
I don't think so. Trust me, I know the guy. Or hand, rather.
Really now? I'm going to enjoy this.
So as the Ultimate Gamer, I'm sure you've played my game, right?
Six toes? Is that normal?
Has Monkey Island fallen on hard times?
Ghost pirate zombies are always fun.
Brave of you. Not very smart, but brave.
Do you know what a video game is, Jenetta?
(Wish I knw there were so many half-rabbits during the revolt...)
Shoes in this game are as annoying as little bugs.
Quite the renaissance girl, aren't you?
Looking at this girl, I doubt she's ever "gotten lucky".
I'm not sure either. Although I'm sure Pit would say a hot dog.
But do they still squeak?
Your both white clowns to me. At least, you're both wearing white make-up.
Doesn't it get sweat and whatnot trapped underneath it?
It's not like she's lying to her self. She's just not in a hurry to admit it.
Like mine! Who knew humans had that variety as well?
What frilly shoes! But then again, your whole outfit is... immodest.
You, Kyu? You're scrawny! Pit or even Viridi could outwrestle you.
You, Kyu? You're scrawny! Pit or even Viridi could outwrestle you.
I'm surprised you even had somewhere to store an ID.
Oh yes, the collar. Attached to your invisible shirt, I assume?
Don't worry, spirits like you and I still appear on film. Everyone will see your nudity in due time.
I don't play favorites here.
You know, I knew someone else who used yo-yos as their weapon of choice. Although Ness always looked more like a bee than a ladybug...
Speaking of, why is it I'm sensing two souls inhabiting your body?
Bit presumptuous, aren't you?
I like the way you think, Tojiko!
Talk about your anachronisms...
You mean to tell me even the staff doesn't want you undressing so much?
Complaining about stripping smaller things. I wonder how you ended up like this?
Now you're getting the hang of it!
You know, this is still a public area. You don't have to take off both.
Calling her out seems a bit silly, don't you think?
Maybe Go Fish is more your speed?
I imagine retying that must be a pain, day after day.
I see you like your jewelery as well.
I didn't know the people of Hyrule used sandals.
Oh, a circlet! Are you sure you're not the real deal?
What an interesting individual you are! Like the child of man and monster!
Has anything on a heroes belt been helpful to anyone? Ever?
I suppose we can let it slip. Only fair, seeing how you're not wearing pants for whatever reason.
You don't need padded gloves. Especially considering there may be an ace or two hidden up it.
Hmm. Must be tough finding socks when you're a cold-hearted killer.
I'm of firm belief that holsters are unneccesary. You want to use a weapon, wield it at all times.
Seeing as that's a threat and at least one of us here is mortal, I'll let it count.
I take it you play around fire a lot? Very few burns. Impressive.
Rinkah looks about as much as a Yorha as I do.
What an awkward place to meet up at.
Are you sure? Magnus can be a real jerk about it.
Maybe later, you two?
Well! Let's see where this takes us.
I'd love to see how you two could make a pair of boots awkward.
How modest. I like that.
Better stand up quickly before she decks you.
Ah, so that's a belt? Very cool. Very, very cool.
Just sit back and watch, Pit. It'll do you good.
That doesn't sound like an expression you should know. Who taught it to you?
You might want to hurry it up, then. That'll just get in the way of a real fight.
Look Pit! Even humans learned to fly before you!
Is that fire? Why...?
Oh. And just when it looked like your arms healed up.
Wait, that was all around your head... if you have a brain, it probably took a hit or two there.
And as cute as a ribbon, too. That ribbon, specifically.
Chelsea, Chelsea... doesn't ring a bell. Must be famous in just your world.
Those hands are doing better than any flimsy old ribbon could.
A ribbon would just accentuate her nudity. She's better off without.
The fact there are two of her says it all, really.
Take it from a goddess: you don't need powers to see that.
What I want to know is what school gives out shoes that gaudy.
All the hormones must have gone to her head.
(I wish all souls could wield weapons. Maybe then the Underworld threat wouldn't have gotten so big...)
(I wonder who'd win in a knife fight between these two.)
Sure, sure. I imagine a ghost would have all the time in the world.
Not a very convincing facade.
A knife really has no place here. Unless you intended to stab the cards or something.
This is fine.
Ghosts have all kinds of tricks up their incorporeal sleeves, huh?
You really need it. Especially against Sei here.
It came off as passive-aggressive, Spooky.
You're winning, but you still use the knife as a buffer?
A human with the Power of Flight? Amazing!
Ah, right. You're fond of gloves, aren't you?
Married to the job, I think is the right term? How boring.
Hiding secrets, are we, Winter? Awfully distant of you.
It's rude to have lead us on like that.
Well, time keeps on ticking. Moving on.
A win's a win, I suppose.
She didn't say anything. Are you a mind reader, perhaps?
Seems we've got a bit of a split between beauties and muscle-girls. And ~player~, I guess.
It's a lot harder to make conversation with a mute than I expected.
Right back into it, huh? Great!
(I still have no evidence that goblins aren't just an elaborate hoax created by the humans.)
Oh? What would you know about standing on clouds?
That's right. This is her true form. And someone I may have to fight... if it comes to it.
That's right. This is her true form. And someone I may have to fight... if it comes to it.
Don't just play this off! ~player~, this is her true form. And someone I may have to fight... if it comes to it.
Are you willing to prove that?
...You know, your personality is actually pretty fitting for someone who's part cat.
I suppose this was just the first act in your little game. Moving on.
Another gaming enthusiast? Then I assume you know, say, the Smash tournaments?
Would you perhaps like my help, Chiaki? I know many, many video game facts.
Who do you like to play as? I'll be sure to give them an extra-special pounding next time I face them.
I'd love to hear your thoughts on it. Come see me after the game.
So you are a fan? How surreal.
(People will just get inflicted with bullet wounds instead.)
Wouldn't exactly be "Ultimate" if they weren't.
A bit too basic for my tastes, I'm afraid.
I'd say Winslow has a much better deal here than you and Guybrush.
That sounds fun, too.
I'll let it slide. It's not like you have any authority here anyways.
No, please, do go on.
You have some weird priorities, Hermione.
(Wow. She seems so normal compared to most of the others here.)
You have good taste, Jenetta. Don't listen to your sister.
As the authority on many games represented at the Inventory, I know that Chiaki's right. Perhaps I can give you some proof at another time?
We'll see. Actually, can you even see the cards?
What you're saying is he has a shot. Congrats, Jin! That's probably the best you've ever gotten.
After the game, ladies. There's still stripping to do!
You'll get holes in your stockings if you go around like that!
Unfortunate. Seems you're just another human for tonight.
So it did. Probably for the best.
A girl like you? Dancing burlesque? I'd loveto see that.
I have no words.
If you were really nice, you'd do even more for us.
Doesn't seem too hard. Who makes bulky shoes for tiny feet?
Are you just making all this up?
Must be a relief to remove it, yes?
You're staring at one right now.
Let's avoid the personal jabs, okay ladies? We're here to unwind.
She's just pretending to make it seem like she wasn't totally eyeing you.
It's fine, Zoey. Take your time, I'll just get them out the old-fashioned way.
You know, I can feel everyone's arousal level from that reveal. Yours is the highest, Kyu. Care to explain?
Interesting how you don't deny it, Kyu.
Projecting now, are we?
I think you and Pit have a lot in common, Lux.
Our hair is so similar when you have it like that. Are you ripping off my style?
You're awfully chipper for a vampire... and someone about to lose all her clothes.
Yeah, I'd say you were a bit too rough with your stripping.
I wish my servants could be this assertive at times...
Says you. This is a card game, you know.
Well, this is a good alternative. And Z-moves are overrated, anyway.
Apologizing? Don't. I'd rather this be a fair fight.
Wait, I'm pretty sure that bag would've had to come off anyway for you to get totally naked...
Of course. I'd rather deal with someone my own size, anyway.
Calling in in early? Go ahead. We'll find someone more suitable to the table.
I suppose so. Next hand will hopefully be more eventful.
You know, I like this form a lot more. I bet most others do too.
Regardless, it's a sensible first choice.
Or is this just a Labrynnan thing?
No, couldn't be. You're far too generous to be one.

I'm proud, Peach! You won without having to rely on a Mario brother or turnips for once!
You did a lot better than I expected! Maybe I should look into getting a Pearl for myself...
Congratulations, Pit! Have you changed your mind about this place yet?
I'm glad if anyone beat me, it was another goddess. Good job, Rosalina.
Combo game's as strong as ever, Ryu. Congratulations!
Really? That came out of left field. Either way, congratulations!
Well, what do you know? The underdog won.
Not bad, Zelda. Guess the blood of the gods is in you after all.
I think I'll bow out here. I sense danger...

scene.directive: Some time later, at Palutena's Temple...
How fare you, artisan? Was my Power of Teleportation efficient?
No trouble?
~name~? What are you doing here? You shouldn't be here! Unless...
You're actually the one they sent?
...You are? ...Freelance work, you say?
Well, that suits me just fine. As long you're qualified, I don't really care.
I take it you already know what to do, but just to reiterate, you're making a portrait of me.
I love my centurions, but they have the memory of a goldfish. They need the sketch for a statue I'm having them build, since I won't be able to be there with them.
Any questions?
W-what? Can you draw me nude?
Either I'm delusional, or you have some serious stones, asking a goddess that.
(But now that I think about it, some of the best human statues are nude, aren't they? David, Venus de Milo...)
(And it's not like ~name~ hasn't seen me naked before now.)
(Am I seriously considering this?)
I'll- I'll do it.
But can you close your eyes for about thirty seconds?
Things'll get a little... bright in here.
*SHNG*
...Okay, go ahead and open them.
Okay. Now I'm ready.
...You better appreciate this. I even used a shaving spell.
Don't let me catch you gawking either!
(Okay, going well so far. ~name~'s being surprisingly professional about this.)
(Now I just have to hold it for a few...more...hours. Great.)
A few hours later...
Oh? We're finally done? Thank goodness.
(And right as I was starting to get used to it.)
It feels good to finally get off my feet!
Don't worry, I'll handle the rest from here. Thank you for your work!
(But first, a little self-relief....)
...Why are you still standing there? I'd like some privacy if you don't mind.
...Leave.
Much, much later...
Well? Want to see the fruits of your labor? I'm about to see it for the first time too.
How exciting!
Well, it's not terrible.
But the face leaves something to be desired.
Seems your sketch didn't translate perfectly.
Well, guess it can't be helped...
We're gonna have to start over from scratch!
Let's go, ~name~! I'm counting on you to do it flawlessly this time!
